channel.title: 100 Errors, New to Servers
channel.description:
Hey um... I'm quite new to "coding" if you can even call it that. But I was just going along nicely 'til I got 100 errors while compiling, I have no clue what to do.. here's the error
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- client.java:233: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 877; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 38 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:234: class, interface, or enum expected }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1353) { // steel axe ^ client.java:235: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 875; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 36 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:235: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 875; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 36 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:236: class, interface, or enum expected }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1355) { // mith axe ^ client.java:237: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 871; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 34 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:237: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 871; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 34 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:238: class, interface, or enum expected }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1357) { // addy axe ^ client.java:239: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 869; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 32 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:239: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 869; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 32 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:240: class, interface, or enum expected }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1359) { // rune axe ^ client.java:241: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 867; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 30 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:241: class, interface, or enum expected chopAnim = 867; hasAxe = true; bestWCTimez = 30 - (0.1*getLevelF orXP(playerXP[8])); ^ client.java:242: class, interface, or enum expected }else{ ^ client.java:244: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:246: class, interface, or enum expected bestWCTimez+= .5; bestWCTime = (int) bestWCTimez+i*3; bestWCTime = misc. random(bestWCTime) + i*2 + 1; ^ client.java:246: class, interface, or enum expected bestWCTimez+= .5; bestWCTime = (int) bestWCTimez+i*3; bestWCTime = misc. random(bestWCTime) + i*2 + 1; ^ client.java:247: class, interface, or enum expected if (bestWCTime < 10) ^ client.java:249: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:251: class, interface, or enum expected public void startChop(int i, int req, int logIDz, int multXP, int treeid, int st umpid) { ^ client.java:253: class, interface, or enum expected if (actionTimer == 0) { ^ client.java:258: class, interface, or enum expected treeTimer[i] = bestWCTime; ^ client.java:259: class, interface, or enum expected setAnimation(chopAnim); ^ client.java:260: class, interface, or enum expected logID = logIDz; ^ client.java:261: class, interface, or enum expected chopXP = multXP * playerLevel[8]; ^ client.java:262: class, interface, or enum expected treeID[i] = treeid; ^ client.java:263: class, interface, or enum expected stumpID[i] = stumpid; ^ client.java:264: class, interface, or enum expected actionTimer = 4; ^ client.java:265: class, interface, or enum expected }else{ ^ client.java:267: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:270: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:273: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:277: class, interface, or enum expected public void doChop(int i) { ^ client.java:281: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:286: class, interface, or enum expected }else{ ^ client.java:288: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:292: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:295: class, interface, or enum expected treeTimer[i] = 0; ^ client.java:296: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("A tree spirit appears and attacks you!"); ^ client.java:297: class, interface, or enum expected wcRandom = 0; ^ client.java:298: class, interface, or enum expected setAnimation(0x328); // reset anim ^ client.java:299: class, interface, or enum expected SummonNewNPC(443); ^ client.java:300: class, interface, or enum expected spiritAttack(playerId); ^ client.java:301: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:306: class, interface, or enum expected if (treeTimer[i] == 7) { ^ client.java:308: class, interface, or enum expected addSkillXP(chopXP, 8); ^ client.java:309: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("You Get some Money!"); ^ client.java:310: class, interface, or enum expected checkTime(i); ^ client.java:311: class, interface, or enum expected treeTimer[i] = bestWCTime; ^ client.java:312: class, interface, or enum expected numLogs--; ^ client.java:313: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:319: class, interface, or enum expected if (treeTimer[i] == 7) { ^ client.java:321: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(995, 1500*playerLevel[8]); ^ client.java:322: class, interface, or enum expected addSkillXP(chopXP, 8); ^ client.java:323: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("You get some "+GetItemName(logID)+"."); ^ client.java:324: class, interface, or enum expected checkTime(i); ^ client.java:325: class, interface, or enum expected treeTimer[i] = bestWCTime; ^ client.java:326: class, interface, or enum expected numLogs--; ^ client.java:327: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:332: class, interface, or enum expected ReplaceObject2(treeX[i], treeY[i], stumpID[i], -2, 10); ^ client.java:333: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("The tree has run out of logs!"); ^ client.java:334: class, interface, or enum expected }else if (treeTimer[i] == 1) { ^ client.java:336: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:340: class, interface, or enum expected public void spiritAttack(int idZ){ ^ client.java:341: class, interface, or enum expected for(int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++){ ^ client.java:341: class, interface, or enum expected for(int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++){ ^ client.java:346: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].RandomWalk = t rue; ^ client.java:347: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; ^ client.java:348: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:349: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:355: class, interface, or enum expected public int[] rockTimer = new int[7]; // 7 types of rocks this will allow mining for ^ client.java:356: class, interface, or enum expected public int[] rockX = new int[7]; // 7 different rocks can be used at the same ti me by players ^ client.java:357: class, interface, or enum expected public int[] rockY = new int[7]; // 7 different rocks can be used at the same ti me by players ^ client.java:358: class, interface, or enum expected public int stunTimer = 0; // stunning players after random ^ client.java:359: class, interface, or enum expected public int rockExplode = 0; // random explosion ^ client.java:360: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean hasPick = false; // does the player have a pick ^ client.java:361: class, interface, or enum expected public int bestTime = 0; // best time you can have when mining ^ client.java:362: class, interface, or enum expected public int mineAnim = 0; // animation for mining ^ client.java:363: class, interface, or enum expected public int barID = 0; // id of the bar that will be given ^ client.java:364: class, interface, or enum expected public int mineXP = 0; // xp to be given from mining ^ client.java:365: class, interface, or enum expected public int[] rockID = new int[7]; // id of the rock object being mined ^ client.java:368: class, interface, or enum expected public void checkPick(int i) { ^ client.java:370: class, interface, or enum expected if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265) { // bronze pick ^ client.java:371: class, interface, or enum expected mineAnim = 625; hasPick = true; bestTimez = 40 - (0.1*getLevelFo rXP(playerXP[14])); ^ client.java:371: class, interface, or enum expected mineAnim = 625; hasPick = true; bestTimez = 40 - (0.1*getLevelFo rXP(playerXP[14])); ^ client.java:372: class, interface, or enum expected }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267) { // iron pick ^ client.java:373: class, interface, or enum expected mineAnim = 626; hasPick = true; bestTimez = 38 - (0.1*getLevelFo rXP(playerXP[14])); ^ client.java:373: class, interface, or enum expected mineAnim = 626; hasPick = true; bestTimez = 38 - (0.1*getLevelFo rXP(playerXP[14])); ^ client.java:374: class, interface, or enum expected }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269) { // steel pick ^ client.java:375: class, interface, or enum expected mineAnim = 627; hasPick = true; bestTimez = 36 - (0.1*getLevelFo rXP(playerXP[14])); ^ client.java:375: class, interface, or enum expected mineAnim = 627; hasPick = true; bestTimez = 36 - (0.1*getLevelFo rXP(playerXP[14])); item.title: 100 Errors, New to Servers
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

S I N N E R:

I think it might be an anti-leech, as I just downloaded the server =[]

an anti leech only has .class files no .java files
so if you edited then its not anti leech

Read full topic

item.title: 100 Errors, New to Servers

item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

S I N N E R:

I think it might be an anti-leech, as I just downloaded the server =[]

No, its a simple problem. I can’t remember exactly what but i think you misplaced a bracket.
